Data Fields
ADCBuf_FxnTable_t Struct Reference

The definition of an ADCBuf function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific ADC driver implementation. More...

#include <drivers/adcbuf/ADCBuf.h>

Data Fields

ADCBuf_CloseFxn closeFxn

ADCBuf_GetChanBufAddrFxn getChanBufAddr
 

Detailed Description

The definition of an ADCBuf function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific ADC driver implementation.

Field Documentation

ADCBuf_CloseFxn ADCBuf_FxnTable_t::closeFxn

Function to close the specified peripheral

ADCBuf_ControlFxn ADCBuf_FxnTable_t::controlFxn

Function to driver implementation specific control function

ADCBuf_GetChanBufAddrFxn ADCBuf_FxnTable_t::getChanBufAddr

Function to get ADC buffer address for a given channel

ADCBuf_InitFxn ADCBuf_FxnTable_t::initFxn

Function to initialize the given data object

ADCBuf_OpenFxn ADCBuf_FxnTable_t::openFxn

Function to open the specified peripheral
